title: Dairy Barn, Highway 22, Near Somerset, Perry Co., Ohio
marks:
Signature, Title, Date, Inscription and Stamp

s on back at bottom edge, in black ink: [DAIRY BARN,
description: barn with several additions and open silo at left; dry grey wood; rusted sign at left:  \"Enjoy Good Health...DRINK MILK\"; farm fields and rows of trees at right
creditline: Given in memory of Ted Hartwell in gratitude for decades of friendship, and also in appreciation of the friendship of his son, Joe Hartwell
